dict.acceptation: 晚饭，晚餐；夜点心；晚餐会；

sent.orig: In this case supper may be a light snack before bedtime.
sent.trans: 这时，supper可能指临睡前吃的夜宵。

sent.orig: Next I play computer games till the time to have supper.
sent.trans: 接下来我玩电脑游戏直到到吃晚饭的时间了。

sent.orig: The signora was sitting very comfortably up to her supper.
sent.trans: “夫人”很舒服地坐起身在那吃晚饭。

sent.orig: We had prepared supper for the team and they all pitched in.
sent.trans: 我们给队员准备了晚餐，他们全都大吃起来。

sent.orig: In the evening, he visited his friends and he had a good supper that evening.
sent.trans: 晚上，他去看望他的朋友们，那天晚上他还吃了一顿很好的晚餐。
